question:
Which of the following is a man-made disaster?
1) Volcanism
2) Pollution
3) Terrorism
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Man-made disasters which are also called as Anthropogenic disasters are hazards that are caused by human action. Some of the major Man-made disasters are Terrorism, Pollution, Climate change, etc. On the other hand Volcanism is a natural phenomenon.
